Loved it. A new hero to rival Denzel's Man of Fire and Equaliser. Hemsworth is on a mission that goes south more times than he gets shot! Some look away violent scenes and some boos when goodies get shot but all in all Hemsworth gets the job done - no idea how - but he does. Well worth a watch if you like this type of film.

reviews.review_title: A lesson for Bollywood film makers on how to make a good action movie
reviews.content: This was an enjoyable movie indeed, the action sequences were mind blowing and provided an entertaining watch. The neighborhoods of Bangladesh resembles with many areas of India and looking at some of the breathtaking action scenes I think this movie should provide a lesson to our bollywood film makers as to how to make a proper action movie in India. I am an Indian and seriously feel that in the name of 'action' thriller most of our film makers just fool us with monotonous action scenes which repeatedly involves humans and cars flying unprecedentedly high in the sky after an explosion or a punch of the actor who isn't even playing the role of any superhero. This movie had a top hollywood and bollywood celebrity (Helmsworth and Randeep Hooda) and both did their jobs perfectly well, this just proves that Indian actors aren't anyway less than the best of the world when given a good director.There were some shortcomings too, it had too much of violence and it didn't have a strong story and a plot to compliment such well shot action sequences and amazing cinematography, the story telling wasn't at it's best yet this movie seems to be the best action movie shot in South Asia.

reviews.review_title: Sufficient study wasn't done before making the movie
reviews.content: The only part I liked about this movie is Chris and few action scenes. The story is too raw like 1980s typical action movies. I know its a movie and no relation with real life but to build a good movie we expect director will do some research so that some basic things doesn't deviate much from reality. I live in Bangladesh and all the things showed about Bangladesh not even close to realities. Neither the environment, culture, child terrorism, landscape, socio economy condition nothing is even close.

reviews.review_title: Nothing Special here . Jason Bourne and John Wick already did a better job .
reviews.content: The only thing that is okay in this movie is chris acting but as i mentioned in the headline Nothing Special here . Jason Bourne and John Wick already did a better job .

They just knos that we will pay to watch because Chris Hemsworth is the hero. Very poor plot, they just put an Asian cover add new look. Same old story, emotionally involvement which probably used in hundredsof time in other movies. Also a complete misrepresentation of Bangladesh. For God's sake I am not sure now that the well poor/corrupted/dangerous countries are really that bad or just Hollywood makes us thinks like that!!!!

reviews.review_title: I'm not Indian, so I was not offended by portraying.
reviews.content: This movie was well done and I was very impressed with the action scenes and the quiet moments too. The hatred comes from a cultural representation which I could care less about because it's not a documentary, it's a action flick.

Taking away 2 stars for abundant political incorrectness, an otherwise superbly choreographed and executed killing feast. If you like watching one man killing others in the dozens like annoying bugs, don't look any further.

Good action and good cenematography,
but weak story. Recommended to watch together if you want to fulfill your time.

Action scenes were very nicely filmed. Hemsworth performance is fantastic, he is gone crazy into his role. Although story may lack little spice, but although some logical parts are great where he introduce hemsworth controlling his breath lining that how it helps him in the end battling his life. Overall it s not bad for a first time stuntman turned director.

reviews.review_title: Thin storyline, pinch of drama, loads of action
reviews.content: It's an action packed movie, great direction, cinematography, good action sequences and stunt co-ordination. Don't get hung up about the language, Dhaka, realism, etc. just enjoy it for what it was intended for. A gritty action movie. Chris was surprisingly very impressive as an action hero.
Don't waste your time. This movie contain so poor..its represent a country in wrong way. They disrespect a country. They show wrong info..

reviews.review_title: The plot of this year's best movie
reviews.content: Movie is amazing, everyone's acting was also right. The action scenes are very joss!

reviews.review_title: The movie over did the city
reviews.content: The movie is pretty good but they made the city too much in a bad way things like-holding up guns to children and showing dat gangster rules the city thats why i am giving it 7 otherwise it deserves 8

reviews.review_title: High octane action saga will blow your mind!
reviews.content: It's a hard core action movie with 2 main badass characters. The action looks so real (unlike the wire work and slow motion thing). Hats off to the director who was a stuntman once upon a time. There's very simple plot yet some twists are there. One more thing is that, either cricket or movie, bangladeshi people are always unnecessarily finding issues and not showing sport. It's not a documentary of Dhaka, it's a movie !! Appreciate the efforts of director please.
No story no background no reference of characters. Only action with no connection of entities Very poor direction..
Better than other netflix action flicks. Stunts are good. Way too much story. Should have been one and twenty minutes long.
Good to watch action move however disappoints with last scene. Overall recommend to watch to see real kind of action

The action was great but plot was weak, No intelligence, plot twist or unpredictability. Simply the one who comes in between the extraction will pay. Action sequences were well choreographed and executed. One thing was great they didn't used the shaky camera technique, so every move was visible thanks to a good cinematography. It's much better than many commercial films but don't watch it with high expectation.

reviews.review_title: Excellent action sequences, poor character motivation.
reviews.content: This is a great p***k flick. The action is non stop and the filming many times reminds me of a shooter game. Chris Hemsworth and the stunt team kept me on the edge of my seat. My criticism would be Chris Hemsworth character's motivation. The loss of his son to cancer seems a little weak for a professional mercenary to become basically suicidal. But I must repeat that the combat scenes and the pacing was excellent. I've read some critiques that were critical of the portrayal of the India and Bangladesh locales, that the depictions of the scenery and the people were not accurate. Be that as it may, I was more enamored by the highly skilled heroes (anyone who has fired a weapon on the move will appreciate) then the scenery. I hope Tyler Rake is alive and well and will soon be seen in another adventure.

reviews.review_title: Best Action Movie I have seen in a while
reviews.content: Fight scenes will take your breath away.. I love this movie I watched twice and I will watch it again
Just watched it....and the action scenes seems so realistic and fluent ...worth watching movie
Ok - we all have low expectations now that we are during Covid 19 quarantine.. but this film is a total waste of time .

Such a shame, but it seems that hollywood stopped making decent movies in 2005 or so.. :(
The premise for this movie was decent, hostage rescue, set it in india.. that could have been original.. but then they turn it into a 'invincible soldier runs about killing thousands of masked bad guys' piece of nonsense. And what's worse, they try and make it into somekind of emotional journey... Such a disappointment, really actors like chris helmsworth? need to stop chasing the netflix paycheck and be more picky about the types of movies they accept. For sure netflix might pay well just now, but if he makes another one of these turkeys he'll soon find himself stuck in b-movie limbo.
Di caprio is the only actor I can think of who isn't chasing netflix cash and is protecting his name...
Anyway, I'm gonna rewatch 'proof of life' a proper hostage rescue movie.
Combine all the bullets of Rambo and Die hard movies in one. There is absolutely nothing except shooting in this movie.

1st of All thnx for different presents of Avengers Team heavily.specialy Thor.
for action+story i m rating 8/10.But the movie has represented Bangladesh totally wrong as bangla language problem, location,story, & administration.It's totally battered.
They may make it as Kolkata.
Bangladesh is disappointed.
Seen it all before. Lazy movie. Switched it out half way through

Good action but the whole movie was in a big question
Very weak scenario

reviews.review_title: This is not a Bangladeshi tourist documentary.
reviews.content: So netflix have made a movie in Bangladesh/Dakar and the first chance people get is to get totally wound up on the location, culture etc. Get over yourselves and comment on the films merits or lack of. My only observation are that the police/ army have the aim of Imperial Stormtroupers. And the tactical awarness of U.S Swat teams. Peace out.

reviews.review_title: Hemsworth lays waste to dozens of Indian police officers to save life of a teenager. What a hero!
reviews.content: An absolutely brainless action flick, coupled with cheesy flashbacks and cliche 'must save the kid' moral code storyline.Little to no original elements. You will forget this the next morning.The main hero is suppose to be a 'good' guy, but ironically goes on to lay waste to dozens of police officers that are merely following orders of their corrupt general. This is also after we hear a speech from the kid about how everyone that his drug lord father kills is someone else's father or son etc.Long story short. Hemsworth decides to kill half the police force of an Indian town after deciding that he will get the teenage son of a drug dealer, who by the way fails to pay Hemsworth and whose people later try to kill him out of danger!

reviews.review_title: What's up with this Yellow Filter?
reviews.content:
Seriously I like this movie story was nice, Performance were good & the Action was Great.
Overall Good Movie.
I just had 1 problem though not only with this movie but every time when India or Indian subcontinent is showcased in Hollywood why the hell it's shown with yellow. I understand that they use yellow filter to show western region of USA in Hollywood bcoz of desert & all. But why in India??
Why are they so obsessed with it?

I Don t know how but Netflix has done a really action movie, like other said here with fast pace,not so boring like almost Netflix movie, with good filming scenes.
I felt for the first time that I look on Netflix like I look on cinema.
But he died in the end or he survived.

reviews.review_title: We aren't a damn terrorist country
reviews.content: You can't picture my country, country's military, elite forces and police in such a way! We aren't a damn terrorist country.Do you know our military serve UN as a leading UN forces? Do you even know our peoples? Our culture? Our history?Who are you to tell the world that our country's law enforcement agencies are run by so called drug lords?! How can you imagine that such children carry arms in our streets!Bangladesh is just full of peace loving country and our boys are here keep light shining day & nights. They are not run by such terrorists!Its a shame Netflix!!#ShameOnNetflix
It's literally 2 hours of punching with very little plot development.
A great action packed adventure from the get go. Directorial debut of Sam Hargrave who took all his stunt training into account. Chris Hemsworth as always bring a great acting appearance.

reviews.review_title: This movie makes you feel like you're really in Dhaka...
reviews.content: Shot and filmed in the heart of the nicest areas of Dhaka, Balgladesh, I can't wait to visit one day. The accents were perfect, the action was amazing and the camera shots were brilliant. Many thanks for allowing us viewers to see behind the scenes of Dhaka.

It was good movie,a good action movie but had some problems:first of all screenplay got some lag.Taylor's conncetion with Son was weird.Killing without infinity people by a person is a part of action movie but it should change and i excepted it happen in 2020
So top indian drug dealer has no money, no power but top Bangladeshi don owns his country's all force!!?but again whole Bangladeshi force couldn't take down two people.

Im an action movie junky to the core and I really loved this movie!! Sure the plot has been done many times before but its supposed to be a fun movie point blank. The action was incredible with the hand to hand combat. Chris Hemsworth and the rest of the cast did a hell of a job with this one. Movie had me on the edge of my seat. There was only very FEW MINOR things that bothered me but wasn't a big deal.Anyone who's complaining about location of the movie that it is not accurate...WHO CARES!...Its a film that takes place in a fictional setting. Its like other movies that take place in New York but is filmed in Chicago or other major cities. It doesnt always have to be on point with location. If the movie has "No Logic" then go watch another movie. This movie isn't supposed to bring logic its a fun fast pace action packed film. Enjoy it for what it is.

reviews.review_title: Wrong way of showing Dhaka, Bangladesh
reviews.content: I would have rate this movie at least 8 if they were showing the dhaka city properly.. the way you represented dhaka is not real..... If it's really dhaka then my whole life was a lie..

reviews.review_title: Felt Like Typical Bollywood Mainstream Film
reviews.content: I didn't find interesting this film. Story is very cliche. Actions were pretty good that's why I'm giving 3 otherwise It's a zero from me.Upgraded version of Bajrangi Bhaijaan.A nation's whole forces can't be corrupted to a drug dealer. That's a lame point of the movie to be honest.

reviews.review_title: High octane action, kill, kill, kill.....
reviews.content:
In the above 5 words you can describe the whole movie. Movie is high on action, proves it is directed by an action director.
Chris Helmsworth bury his funny side and comes out as a no nonsense macho shooting bullets and giving fist fights.
Movie has a linear storytelling.
Where it lacks short in storytelling and you may not feel connected.
Overall its a good one time watch and you will like if you are an action freak.

Started great, plot seemed ok for most part, then scareface kid came into film kept getting big scenes .... No!!! End scene kid with a finger missing with no gun experience shots the main Man from distance! ..... didn't bother watching anymore from here, so many films start ok .. then some numpty writing the script with no military brain or not much of a brain ruins the film.
This movie has a good action scenes and a good trama as well. Great performance by the actors
Loved the movie, the action, the plot, the acting, everything was amazing
Fun movie reminiscent of "Man On Fire" with Denzel Washington. Fun nonstop action. Good chemistry for Hemsworth and the kid he's trying to rescue.
No story, no character, no soul, no humor. Just violence and crazy camera movements. A Sad film

Rake seems to do a good job in killing people - over 180 if Netflix is right. The story is flat & weak, characters simple. In a chase 'home' with a kidnapped teenager too many are seemingly in his way. I like action movies but nobody asks the question why not wait? Mainly normal & elite police, ordered by a corrupt chief, is dieing in hundreds for one child, less as hunters than as hunted. Rake chooses to see no other way. Strangely, help can get in with bazookas, a helicopter in and out. What about the sentence of Ovid ' today my father killed onother father - I am getting sock about it' ? One is getting sock about this useless deaths without a story or a ratio. Better watch 'John Rambo' or Blade of the Immortal instead.

reviews.review_title: The BEST film on Netflix...MUST SEE!!!
reviews.content: This film is amazing, with great camera work and amazing acting. One of chris Hemsworths best films. The whole film from the first minute is action packed with savage fight scenes and call of duty like guns this film is a MUST SEE !!!

reviews.review_title: Kill bill lovers this is a treat for you...
reviews.content: Girl like me who loves action, fights.... And if you are big fan of God of war,. kill bill.. And obviously Chris❤💕...... Just watch it...... Its a fun packed roller coaster...... And a very good indian Or desi touch given to action scenes..... Love love love.

This is an action packed movie with full on close combat techniques and survival insticts.
It is foolish that people are voting it down saying Dhaka doesn't look like this and the local slang is different. So childish. Maybe Dhaka guys were expecting a more exact Dhaka. Guys please, some shots are taken in the studios and not all scenes are taken in the streets in Bangladesh. Dont cry for such things..Cheers Mate..!

If you're into action... watch it, nothing left to say about it except it's got all the prerequisites of a good action movie... bad ass good guy goes out to rescue a hostage, bad guy gets a bunch of people after him, bad ass guy destroys everybody, there's a good fight scene in the middle, then more action overdose,..

reviews.review_title: Action is great but lacks strong plot
reviews.content: Action and cinematography is excellent. Direction is good too it keeps you engaged right from the first 10 mins. Plot could have been stronger and better.

reviews.review_title: One of the Best till date!!
reviews.content: Awesome unprecedented action. Movie was fast and intriguing.. and for sake of information, mostly anti-India or Bangladeshi extremist elements are downgrading this movie. It deserves a rating over 8. No politics required

We have seen Transporter series...
We have seen Excess baggage.....We have a lot of such kidnap- nap nap movies..
What we expect is Action of course & some unique dialogues+ Style...Of course the movies ain't bad, its a good attempt of entertainment....
But it lacks the Action of Jason Stetham, The sensible dialogue delivery of Pankaj Tripathi(Very much expected) & Randeep Hooda was best in Once upon a time in Mumbai as cop.Always tinted screen(like night mod in cellphones), Hindi movie songs in background(most of the times) & Guns.....
Thts it....
The story is nice. The combat scenes are more likely a realist. Action scenes done by Chris more intensified. Total action drama film and worth watch it.

Besides the fact I'm waiting for editors to use subtitles in a way where the audience can read them, this movie was excellent. Acting was superb, action was on par with some of the best. The continuous shots were amazing. Overall, a really good film. You will enjoy it!!

reviews.review_title: Awesome movie by creators of marvel
reviews.content:
21: Battle of Saragarhi
Please Randeep Hooda Sir complete it
Tell hollywood your story about kesari anf you please. Maybe make it a international movie.Kesari movie betrayed you and destroyed all your years of hardwork.

reviews.review_title: A Strong Hemsworth, but a lackluster plot
reviews.content: Strong action sequences and Hemsworth has a flare of John Wick efficiency as he moves through each piece. Weaponry and sound are very well done. Explosions were clearly costed on a budget but overall the effects are nice enough.Its typical Netflix production though where the ending is weak.The film overall is fairly average, not bad, but nor is it great. Good for sitting down and killing time during corvid19 lockdown with a pizza and a beer.

reviews.review_title: A great flick, rated badly by dumb people of BD
reviews.content: Who the frick cares about the environment of Dhaka. These miserable dumb hypocrite fricks are showing just what they are by rating this based on their expectations of the representation of Dhaka.Stop complaining about the city or the accent, the movie it's not about that.Other than that It's a great action flick. There are long uncut shots, great vfx and a somewhat believable plot. The acting is also great. Chris Hemsworth was awesome as always.
Packed with amazing action scenes and a small story which slows down during imotional scenes. The action makes the film a watchable one. Sure one for action film lovers

reviews.review_title: Good film , some pathetic petty reviews on here
reviews.content: Good action film with , well filmed fight scenes and an entertaining fight scene with the street kids. Puzzled by the reviews on here you do realise a film like this is Fiction right... One review even says good film and gives it a 1 star haha.It's a pretty decent action film to kick back with!
If the British are talking with american accent, then this movie is perfect.

reviews.review_title: It doesn't need to be a masterpiece to be VERY entertaining !!
reviews.content:
Perhaps if we weren't in quarantine, based on rating only like I usually do, I would have not watched it.If you like action movies, you will like this one for sure. If you don't, then don't bother. Even my 87 old mother liked it and she is picky !Don't usually write reviews but thought the rating was unfair. It should be more tending to indicate if the movie is worth watching or not.
This one keeps you at the edge of your seat the whole time and engaged until the end. Enjoy !

reviews.review_title: Take this as a pure action
reviews.content:
Dont try to get emotionally driven watching this film. Just take it as a pure action film, because you have seen similar plots before.
Secondly, this is fictional, so dont try to relate the film with real representation of any location or any particular background.
Just enjoy the action.

The only good reason to watch the movie is the presence of Chris Hemsworth. Except for him this movie is completely a waste of time. Direction, screenplay and mainly the background score are almost close to worst. Dispite of having action sequences this movie fails to impress. There is no suspense /Thrill. For me it felt totally dull. Even the emotions aren't conveyed well. If you're a Chrims Hemsworth fan give it a try. Else case just avoid watching it.
I think the movie is overrated. Attention was paid to some details but it had a very simple theme in general. Can be watched because of action scenes.

reviews.review_title: Good Action, Impressed by its Single Shot
reviews.content: I agree that the plot is weak, but I think this is a good action movie. I was sold at the scene at the market, impressed and kept thinking "how did they shot this scene?".

reviews.review_title: I enjoyed Chris Hemsworth in this film
reviews.content: So many so-called critics knocking it, I had to see for myself. Maybe I went overboard to give it a 10. I just can't stand the unnecessary negative reviews.But, Hemsworth is believable in the action... manages to border on superhero while being human.Good plot twist... a mechanism in it I've never really seen before. Action is intense.Only thing I didn't like the snap forward to end, shown at beginning of the film. It didn't work for this one... seemed pointless. There needs to be a reason for it.But, other than that, kudos! I look forward to seeing Chris in other films. I still want to see him in a another Star Trek movie. :)
Conversations so quiet that you can not hear, and gunfire and explosions so loud that they rattle the room. Leave some space to hear the dialogue.
Not much new to see. One man show with weapons of all sorts. That's it.
An absolute thriller and breathtaking movie wow just woww
Awesome action movie..direction is really good. Just love the camera movement. Final action scenes are just awesome..chris just nailed it.
As an action flick, it's not too shabby. Storyline pretty bad and highly predictable. Passes an horror so, just don't expect too much.
Watch for Pankaj Tripathi, Randeep Hooda international performance

Don't listen to the  complaining over the portrayal of the region it was supposed to be. This was a very good movie. Brought back a lot of good memories of growing up with the non stop action of Stallone and Arnold movies. Yeah the plot or script may not be the best. But when going to watch a movie like this are you really going for the story or the insane non stop action? And it was some very well done and choreographed action. So ignore the bleeding hearts and people searching for a movie of the year in an intense action movie. And watch this movie

reviews.review_title: One of Netflix's best action movie!!
reviews.content: Who cares about the city?..it's a movie not a documentary,that's how movies are made..get over it!!And a great action one!!
Hundreds of life wasted for a kid didn't like logic of movie
It's just a pedestrian action flick. I really don't get the need for making such a film.

This movie has one of great action sequences, but Acting was poor... Emotions were just exaggerated and not natural, Bangladeshi accent was not at all accurate not even any Bengali speaks like that Bihari people speaks Bengali like that. Hindi songs? Kumar Shanu? On Bangladeshi house? Even West Bengal people watch Bangladeshi tv show and listen to their songs. Basically Action top notch and everything else trash...
Its a good action movie, but the story was the worst. Even represnt a country wrong, don't waste your time by watching this movie

If you are action lover then this is a must watch, breathtaking cinematography with long action scenes, tight close combats and sometimes a feeling of a shooting game will definitely entertain you but that's all folks , yes background music will add some charm to your 117 mins journey. Plot has two sides action and emotion and that's too simple, weak screenplay drag the pace of the movie bit down, not expected from a movie of Hemsworth or Avengers makers.

reviews.review_title: No right to belittle a country.
reviews.content:
PLEASE READ THE WHOLE POST.
THIS IS DEDICATED TO THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN DEFENDING EXTRACTION.Okay I have many points but would like to talk about two main points.
1. THE BANGLADESHI RAP SONG - Please check the subtitles carefully. It has been clearly mentioned as a hindi rap song. I question the production team how they allowed to sell a song like this.2. THE BANGLADESHI ARMY - Who gave them the right to belittle Bangladesh army dress. Lot of you might say that it is not the exact dress, dude they have used the 🇧🇩 flag on the shoulders.
I AM A CIVILIAN still I would be against this because the army is not a force to be neglected this way.THERE ARE MANY MORE LIKE A WHOLE MOVIE WITH KOLKATA BANGLA LANGUAGE AND WITH NO BANGLADESHI ACTORS . Donot say they donot have the budget to hire bengali actor and I can assure that there is better actors like Chanchal and many more.
REPRESENTATION MIGHT BE OVERSEEN AS THIS IS MOVIE BUT THIS POINTS CANNOT BE OVERSEEN.
THANKYOU FOR READING AND PLEASE RATE THE MOVIE BADLY. HAVE A GREAT RAMADAN.

reviews.review_title: lots of great action but that's pretty much it
reviews.content: Too much action. no plot. Hemsworth delivers but that is pretty much it. if you just want a pure mindless action movie, this is it. but expect no plot or character development. too overstretched for such a weak plot, it could have easily been made into one and a half hours. killing the villain at the end of the movie was too easy.

reviews.review_title: Lack of dialogues , over dosage of action , lack of writing , one time watch
reviews.content: First of the Indian actor Randeep Hooda is a really good actor and Chris is really badass but writing of this movie is really poor lack of dialogue just action scene after action scene ... I am not against action scenes but come on atleast give us decent story and dialogue atleast ... one time watch only ... I wish next time they work on story also just like they work on action scenes
The story must of taken 5 mins to write but some how that dont matter as the film is a thrill to watch

reviews.review_title: Hemsworth and Netflix tried to cash the lockdown but...
reviews.content:
Extraction has nothing new to offer. Netflix and Chris Hemsworth(He is the producer of the film) just tried to cash the lockdown and popularity of Chris Hemsworth. Otherwise there in nothing new to the film. Same old formula with lots of action and violence. Bodyguard aur Rocky Handsome ka enhanced version hai bas...
Screenplay is written by Joe Russo and it is quite okay, Chris Hemsworth is the only person we see on screen. Randeep Hooda and Pankaj Tripathi has nothing to do. But Priyanshu Painyuly has some screen space and he is a shining star...
So "Extraction" is a completely missable if you are not a hardcore fan of of Chris Hemsworth. Watch something else more interesting like Samantar😊
Great action scenes, if you want to watch a good action movie, this is a good choice. It starts, and doesn't stop until the end.
Worth sitting one and half hour. Though Pankaj Tripathi lover will miss him as he only appeared for a Minutes only. Thore is in new avatar but Impressive. Randeep Hudda justified his role.

reviews.review_title: Technically good but overall Such a boring movie.....
reviews.content:
The single take(looks like) action scene was good but everything else was so boring..... I literally slept before the last 30 minutes...
This film was as pathetic as every Sallu's movies.....
Good movie with action packed scenes. But the ending could have been better.
The movies was very entertaining and action-packed, but the story had no substance and the ending was horrible. Don't waste your time..

Nice to see Hemsworth again outside of the Marvel franchise and can really carry an action movie. Firstly I don't care about the accurate 'accents' or whether it really reflects Bangladesh or not. Looks like a 3rd world hole and a place I'll never visit anyway. Makes a change from the much used south American cartel kidnap a rich kid premise. Grab some snacks and beer and enjoy a couple of hours of action. Netflix is definitely upping their game.

One more bloody movie, lost the total number of killings, worst of all since it wants to impress it contains a violent assassination scene of a child plus another child who becomes an assassin. Pity that in 2021 one keeps on producing these kind of movies,
then no wonder why some people run in a Mall with a gun machine just shooting around.
You'll enjoy watching this movie If you are looking for a good action movie.

reviews.review_title: This not Dhaka but the film was good
reviews.content: I don't know why represented Dhaka incorrectly.but the film was good action packed movie.

"One man army" are OK, and there always will be audience. This movie is exactly of the kind. Starts very good:
1. Great lead
2. Very nice work with weapons, cool up to date technics and mechanics the way weapons are used
3. Great hand to hand combat that brings the right feeling of realistic horror
But.... the plot is so dull - all of it!It's just not realistic, the situations, the decisions... everything!So I'm just sorry for the lost potential in this one. Such a wast of bullets and screen time :)

reviews.review_title: I can't put my finger on why I didn't enjoy it.
reviews.content: There's something about this film that I didn't enjoy. I can't put my finger on it. Maybe it's the speed the movie moved along at or the terrible acting or just the fact it felt like a bad Nicholas Cage film (you can imagine him in this for sure) I just couldn't get involved in it at all

If you are a fan of action movies then this is exactly for you. Hemsworth nailed it in action and the role of Randeep Hooda doesn't disappoints you at all. Pankaj Tripathi's role is small but important. Priyanshu who played negative role in the movie did his job pretty well. The story of the movie is predictable.

Extraction is all about action sequence and all involved actors performances with a poor character development.
But it's a treat for action lover.

reviews.review_title: The movie was a great 8* giving it 10 to balance the 2,3,4* review by Desert clan calling it blaspheme.
reviews.content: The action was superb, Camera work is amazing, Amazing performances. Get a Chilled beer and food on the friends day out and enjoy the journey. Amazing movie fun to watch wont regret.P.S.:- The low rating is due to Religious politics which are not there in the movie absolutely. Found no reason to Criticize.

'Extraction' was a unique and enjoyable film that exceeded my expectations. The performance by Chris Hemsworth in the film was fantastic and I was impressed by the camera angles and shots used, and the way that they wanted the action scenes to seem like one continuous shot, I found it creative. The storyline was fairly gripping, and the plot twists kept me engaged too.This film deserves a 9/10!

All you people rating this 7-10 stars are out of your minds.This movie was "OK". It wasn't great like a "Jason Bourne" or "Mission Impossible" movie in any possible measure. On top of that, the story was completely boring. There weren't any backgrounds of ANY of the characters at all.Could have been SO much better.
Only gunshots & blood bath nothing else. There is no storyline which could able to stick the audience from screen :(

reviews.review_title: High quality, all action, good acting, worth a watch.
reviews.content: I was pleasantly surprised by the non stop action, well choreographed fight scenes, good acting, and satisfying ending. This movie would be the baby of the first John Wick and the first Taken had a baby. Plot could be better but it's an action flick, not a thriller or drama. I enjoyed it immensely.

Well it's action packed for sure, which is just as well because the few quiet scenes expose the mind-numbingly poor acting. I lost count, to the nearest hundred, of the body count by the end, and similarly, the wrecked vehicles, which you have to tally against what the subject of the film was, hence my comments re the plot. All of that said, if relentless 'chase' and 'shoot-em-ups' are your bag, you'll definitely find the two hours running time to be worth it.

Worst-ever, Don't have any sense of presenting.How dare this Garbage presents a Country like this. Do the producer have any idea about history of Bangladesh and force. The Bangladesh Army works UN with full of Honour.

reviews.review_title: Excellent action movie is intense, with two leads and massive chemistry.
reviews.content: This movie is outstanding, and definitely one of my favorite action films. The basic plot is Tyler Rake (Chris Hemsworth) goes on a mission to rescue a druglord's son while battling his own demons.This movie is amazing. The fight scenes are choreographed beautifully with excellent cinematography. The chemistry between Tyler Rake and the druglord's son, Ovi Mahajan, is great. The two work so well together for this film. While this may have a stereotypical plot, that doesn't reduce my enjoyment of it. This movie wasn't trying to blow your mind with a crazy plot twist; it was trying to make an enjoyable action film with great acting and fighting.TLDR: Movie is outstanding and undoubtedly worth a watch.

reviews.review_title: Best action - gun movie in a while.
reviews.content: The title says it all. And look mate....i couldnt care less about bangladesh representation. If you want to know about India or Bangladesh go watch a Documentary. This is a movie , unless you know many guys that kill 100 people in 24 hours, and i dont care how Bangladesh looks or not, if i cared i would watch a Documentary film on India.

reviews.review_title: Good movie but definitely a problematic plot
reviews.content: The characters, plot and performances are all very good in this violent fast paced film. The setting was great and the movie really immerses the audience in the local environment. The problematic part is that the protagonist liteally kills hundreds of police officers. The cops are just trying to follow orders. Sure they are working for a corrupt police chief who is in turn working for an awful drug kingpin but they are just doing their job. So our "hero" is gunning down cop after cop in a John Wickesque fashion. It definitely takes something away from the enjoyment of the film.

reviews.review_title: Excellent action movie from Netflix lately
reviews.content: People from Bangladesh really need to dial it down.

reviews.review_title: Pathetic Portrayal of location, numb plot
reviews.content: Medicre Story line. Was expecting way better from Chris Hemsworth

In a nutshell review of sorts, it's , as some reviewer mentioned " Balls-to-the wall" action movie . It ain't gonna win Academy Awards or nominations like 1917 ; it's more of a "The A Team " or " Taken" movie .
Mr Goldilocks ( Chris Hemsworth ) and his supporting cast were amazing . Action sequences were beautifully done . Unfortunately, same cannot be said ( or wriiten ) about the story line . Story wise, it's more of a Fast n Furious movie, if you know what I mean .
If you can get past the story line , it's a bang for your money ; a very good bang .

reviews.review_title: This was just Hargrave's debut feature and I will give it to him for the superb fight scenes. You should watch this movie if you are a fan of hardcore action but you can do aw
reviews.content: In the first 16 minutes of the film the story seems to be established. Ovi Jr. is kidnapped, Tyler is hired to rescue him, they have studied their opponent Amir Asif and the rescue operation kicks in from the 17th minute. The 1 hour 57 minutes long film, just takes 16 minutes to set up the story and from the 17th minute to 103rd minute seems to be the climax and then the credits start rolling. 99% of the screen time is given to Tyler and Ovi Jr., which is just the fight scenes- this makes the film kind of monotonous.
Good scenes with great video editing, filming!Excellent acting by Hemsworth, chasing scenes 5/5.

It is a action packed thrilled film. However, people are discussing about the misrepresentation of Bangali culture and accent. To me, it is just a film. They tried it though it wasn't its main focus. Regarding the representations, they could have represent the other scenarios like bad congestion, gathering of people everywhere, extreme polluted water, etc. Instead they didn't.
So, Just consider it as a action film with great performance from Chris and Huda. See Ya.

Sam Hargrave is the stunt coordinator for the Russo brothers and they seem to have given him his first chance at directing a full length feature. He does a perfectly adequate job with the highlight being the action sequences as one would expect from an experienced stunt coordinator. That's not to say that this is one stunt after another. There are some good stuff in between. The exterior locations are exotic. There are some good Indian actors in the villain roles. The roof top scene with the kids is fun. I would suggest a different way to go with Ovi. I would go younger and make it a girl to heighten the danger. It should be Man on Fire. One thing that does occur to me. Hemsworth is doing his Rambo in this movie and he could do the remake.

I am from Bangladesh, still have to say its a decent action flick. Its true some of the facts are inaccurate, but nevertheless its not a fact based movie its based on fiction. Cris did a amazing job, the boy as the kidnaped child also have some good acting skills.
Randeep came out strong as a supporting actor. The action sequences were also top noch.

Sure, lots of action. Explosions, killings, etc. As your would expect. Special effects, stunts. Just great. Right? But, and its a big but. Chris Hemsworth is the lead actor. He is an Ass. Tough to get past a Hollywood jerk who gets ignorantly political. How his agent would allow that is always a mystery. That is a real "spoiler".
Action packed movie, terrible plot, actually, there is not a plot.... Don't waste your time
It reminds me of nothing but Terminator 2. We have Chris as Arnold. Action packed.

The potential script had and the movie which got delivered is just makes you feel bad about injustice done.potential of russo combined with hems worth of actions still cannot hide the flat acting and lack of punch lines.i felt like all the characters were there just do school kid's unwanted homework . Villian never felt like threat and david harbour for 5 minutes created the vibe of villainous charm.overall disappointed but i wish sam best wishes to complete his directorial curve and utilize casts in better way .

reviews.content:
Don't read these Bangladeshi cry babies, crying over it. The movie captured every scene perfectly, the action is really good and the camera work is flawless during fist fights and firing scenes.
It's a violent movie, so definitely going to p*ss some so called critiques.And dear bangladeshis, nobody cares. This movie is really good and full of action and a strong base story.
9/10
No questions about that is not goodly shown our respectable country #bangladesh. Next time not try t do this! No good at all
All I can say is this movie is really fun to watch!
This is a fast paced movie, good action, bad guys you love to hate but good lord what an incredibly unsatisfying ending. Ruined the whole movie for me.

reviews.review_title: Please utilize your time do to something better
reviews.content: It is customary to start a review by saying good things. I appreciate the attempt to make a movie in such an atmosphere. The movie attracted a lot of people from Bangladesh and the Indian subcontinent. The action was good. Now let me tell what went wrong. It was deeply measurable to see Indian actors trying to act like Bangladeshi. It is needless to say how measurably they failed. They do not even know what acting is. I advise these actors to go to acting high school, please. For god sake, don't waste your time and others. Starting from the kid, gangsters, local people, environment, and plot everything was wrong in this movie. There is absolutely no story in this movie worth making a movie.
If Chris really need to face the elite force of dhaka, he might die in 3 min!!This is dhaka what you guys are watching !

Well, it turns out that I live in a war zone where there's an abundance of street children running around with rifles shooting people left and right, speaking in a dialect I don't understand entirely, and our entire army force is rendered useless against one Chris Hemsworth.In all seriousness, this was a great movie. But at the end of the day, unlike me, most people don't really know much about Dhaka. It's quite unfortunate that with the massive presence that Netflix has coupled with the relatively low fame of Dhaka city will cause people to assume this is what Dhaka is.I'm truly sorry for the production team, cast and all others who put their hearts and souls into this movie for the backlash you're about to face. I simply don't understand why they had to use a name of a city which has no relevance with what was shown. Couldn't you have just gone with a fictional name?It's movies like this that'll cause people to ask me how I'm still alive or so civilized with the assumption that I live in some war zone. It might not be a big deal for most of you, but for me, it changes how strangers perceive me and every other bangladeshi for that matter
No plot. Only actions. Lots of action. Trying to selling this movie through big names.

Surprised to experience such an ordinary movie delivered by a bright artist like Crish. No sort of thrill, not even a single twist, irrelevant contents actually except of brutal combat there's nothing to attract audience. However, there's no point to depict Dhaka while those scenes actually captured in India...this is absurd you know 😄

Forget the plot, if you like action then watch this for an unpretentious gratuitous shot of adrenaline filled escapism. Hemsworth is supposedly mortal and dispatches the bad guys more mercilessly and in than a Marvel hero. The action is relentless and there is hardly time to catch the breath between scenes. Well filmed and edited - it feels like the audience is thrust right in the middle of the violence but without the nausea inducing camera shakes, quick editing and blurred images. In fact the pièce de résistance is a 'how did they do that?' one track shot. I didn't expect an introspective thought provoking Oscar standard movie and I didn't get one. However I was thoroughly entertained for two hours. Well done Netflix!
Nice camera work, great action, can't get over how the hindus talk two languages the same time.
It's no Bourne series, but there's a enough story to keep you interested and some of the action sequences aren't bad.

Let's start with the good things. Never seen a movie shot in Bangladesh before. The female support character looks pretty nice.
The rest is and endless killing orgy large filmed in video game astetics. Hemsworth is a sociopathic mass murderer whose body count in the movie is probably close to one hundred. The cynical part is that we are supposed to see him as a hero cause he is doing all this to save a boy. Yeah sure. Ok, the action scenes which take up 75% of the time are filmed well but this neglectance for lives just makes me want go puke.
Don't think I am a puritanic family movie guy. I like slashers, I like Tarantino et al. I just hate to be served this Hemsworth character as a hero.

It is a simple story, with little plot, but entertaining as hell. Great action sequences, very good characters (and not entirely predictable when it comes to the fate of some). In a time when we are given 8-10 hrs of limited series material to digest (which is good), it's still refreshing to see a two-hour movie deliver the goods in such a short period. It has heart, good performances, and again... amazing action scenes.

reviews.review_title: Very watchable, top notch action, don't go by dhaka reviews
reviews.content: Chris is superb. Randeep too!! Who cares if it is not matching the accent or location. Average story, good action.

If you want to watch something you've seen countless times before, with a plot as thin as it comes and zero surprises this is the film for you. You know when you put a film on hoping there is more to it than the trailers.......this isn't it.
Shocking, witless, tripe.

Just watch and enjoy
No needed review for it
Just go for it you'll love it

Well it's not a new story but the plus point is man to man combat scenes and every fight scene looks so real that it becomes a treat to watch..
Great job by Chris and Randeep..
Overall a nice watch, just do not keep high expectations but action lovers will definitely like it.

reviews.review_title: Habit is a very bad thing.
reviews.content: Hollywood became habituated by showing Poverty of Africa, Violence of Afghanistan, and Corruption of Mexico. That's why they thought that it is okay to show Bangladesh as a poor, violent and a corrupted country. No suckers. It's not. Do you have any IDEA ABOUT BANGLADESH ARMY????? If you don't, just google it "How Bangladeshi Army is performing at UN peace mission". And next time, if you intent to shoot in Bangladesh, than use Bangladeshi artist and do research about Bangladesh. And why Dhaka is so yellow?? Use better camera and editor next time. Anyway, great effort I must say.

The movie is hilarious, OK? It is shot as an interpretation of Counter Strike with elements from 1.6 to GO version. The body count reaches the early Rambo movies and is close to John Wick. There is artificial blood all the way. It's funny, but not in the Tarrantino way.
There are few good things, though: Chris H. playing his role great, the camera movement is very action-like and.... aaaand that's it. Not sure why the cop from Stranger things agreed to be a bad guy on such as short-lived scene.
The color grading is absurd, it's so yellow-warm fortified, that it literally hurts your eyes and aesthetics.

reviews.review_title: Actions what you want? Then pay your money
reviews.content: I've read some of the 'professional' reviews, jeez they love to write a lot of mampy pampy, flowery gibberish don't they? I honestly don't understand who they write them for and what they compare their experiences to, honestly.Action movie with a tank of a man. Some decent sequences. You're not required to think. You've killed just over an hour of your otherwise dull day ( I hope it wasn't dull and if it was, here's to a better tomorrow, you deserve it ). It ticks those boxes and you don't feel like you've just had your wallet dipped. Well done. Now get off your phone you've already had too much screen time. It's time you let your beautiful brain rest.Good night. Be safe.

Thank you Chris Hemsworth for the Best action Drama of 2020. This movie was just captivating. We were talking to the TV to cheer you on. Wow what a movie!! We are excited to get this movie when it comes out on blueray!!!!
Would have given more,but looks like a war zone for 1 kid...army,police,mercenary ...everyone involved..

Would've been 7/10 for a solid action movie despite a complete lack of plot, but 7/10 implies a 'good' film. God's eye view on a computer screen 'satellite's online!' What satellite?!? And CGI sewer rats? Come on!!Every time I see a movie like this where the finer details (let's not mention the whole location issue) are missed it makes me think I should make movies myself!

reviews.review_title: Mediocre storyline powered by fabulous action sequences
reviews.content: Action choreography is the only thing that worth your time while sitting through this Netflix flick.Chris Hemsworth and Randeep Hooda were really hot in their action avatars.

So much conflict, slight visual effects with minimal in dialogue and fancy characterisation. Resolution good in slight complication. The movie is good action but doen't have sound action appealing and heart pounder, it give hint not hilarious. It deserves my six star with it mere action entertainment, characterisation with Chris hemsworth, and directing by Sam Hargrave as a debut movie. Applause welcoming to the entrance director.

The storyline in this film ain't anything special, It's good but not great. But saying that I really enjoyed the film as a whole. The filming style really stood out, so much so I went back and watched one of the chase scenes again straight after.
It's so hard to believe the director has only done 6 films (most of them being short films) I think he has a huge career in front of him as a director.
The acting was great and the filming locations made it film incredibly raw and real.
Worth a watch for a Friday/Saturday night Film.
I just couldn't stomach this movie; it's more of a cartoon; no script; hero can't get hurt and keeps on wasting multiples of enemies; just really terrible

If you usually find that kind of movie like action crime then this movie for you.
In this movie, plot is very simple. Movies cuts are very impressive. If you talk about Chris Hemsworth and Randeep hudda's acting, was mind blowing. Not compare this movie from bollywood.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU LIKE VIDEO GAME ACTION THIS IS YOUR MOVIE
reviews.content: This movie is an action packed film overdone to the point of ridiculousness. What I liked about it was the its stars, the American and the Indian boy. The boy's performance gives it a nice touch of humanity in a film that otherwise is lacking it. The location scenes in Bangladesh made it interesting to watch since not too many films are made there. The soundtrack with its Hindi rap was annoying.I am sure that as the genre goes it was better than usual at least you will not get bored with all the blood and gore done to the extreme. As crazy as it seems its popularity will require a sequel. Break out the pop corn.

reviews.review_title: Bollywood movie with a Hollywood face
reviews.content:
Its just another action movie in this genre, there are tons of them out there and its just an addition.
I was little disappointed, expected too much on second thought not that much.
casting was great though. But nothing new here.
I seriously felt like another Bollywood movie with a Hollywood face, oh great this can be the title of this review.

Chris was just amazing in extraction. The close combat long shoot gives a gaming feel. But the plot is nothing. There could have been more twists in the movie. I know a action movie doesn't represent a country but still being a representative of this country it really feels irritating when a movie presenting our country totally the wrong way to the world.

reviews.review_title: People outside of Bangladesh will love this movie!
reviews.content: The movie is brilliantly shot, the action scenes are awesome so is the cast. Chris Hemsworth was superb as always. I also liked the part of Randeep Hooda.But, attention to details were way off the track. The whole set looks nothing like Dhaka except for few drone shots. I wouldn't mind if the plot wasn't revolved around Dhaka. The whole story was about rescuing a boy from a gangster based in Dhaka. So the movie should've felt like it's happening in Dhaka. The Bengali accent was inaccurate, the accent used in this movie is from West Bengal, India not from Bangladesh. Child terrorism was never a thing in Bangladesh but the movie clearly emphasized on it. The roads, police, vehicles, locations, buildings, and even the commonly used Bengali fonts on banners and posters are from West Bengal. So this is not nearly an accurate depiction of Dhaka. A slight mismatch would be considerable but this is completely messed up!However, only the people from Bangladesh will feel this way. Everyone else will love this movie. I complained about those things because we have better expectation from big movie industries when it comes to attention to details. And Extraction missed the big picture, details come way later.

He literally killed everyone he killed bad people and also he killed innocent police officers and soldiers who are doing they job . bringing peace and order to the city and protect their City from a criminal . for example in that particular scene in checkpoint .he has no morality.

reviews.review_title: Do the dhaka fans know this is a movie
reviews.content: Its a freaking movie, and a damn fine one. Action action action. Ive wanted to see Hemsworth in a movie like this and it has been very well done.

I think most of the low scorers are Indians. There is a logic error in the story. Overall, it's a video game-like movie. I don't like action movies, but I liked this movie. Weapon scenes and melee scenes are very good.
Great movie, plot was average, action was excellent. Moral of the story, when fighting kids with guns, don't spare them because they're kids.
Must watch during quarantine, maybe people does not like it because of the location but it has great action and some great actors

Do not go by 10/10 or 1/10. Indian idiots are giving it 10/10 because it shows India in a positive light and Bangladeshi Muslims in a negative light. Bangladeshis are giving it 1/10 because it shows Bangladesh in poor light. The problem is most ratings are not based on the artistic quality of the film. I give 5/10 only for the action. Otherwise the film is a total waste of your time. No plot, no characterization, no decent acting, nothing. Just boom effing boom after effing boom.

However and whateverthe actions were shown were reallyridiculou. Since It's partial. And nothing believe able was there. If anyone likes that type of actions may follow B grade Kannada movies where Physics fails to explain the actions.

Vast majority of Netflix films get a lot of hate on here. Significant amount unwarranted. Just like with this film. Entertaining, captivating, exciting. Great scenes, interesting backdrop and scenery. Brutal sequences. Dialogue ok. Plotline mediocre. Overall a really good action film. Can't people just relax and enjoy? Clearly some are too wrapped up in being a "critic".

1. Hero - is cameraman and his execution .. specially when during car chase Camera jumps ..in and out of cars. Keep an eye on Camera angles2. Honest - story is simple and honest picturisation3. Hemsworth - He was incredible and balanced action and emotional scenes well balanced4. Hooda - I saw this just for him. Such a versatile actor he has become over the years. It was short role but satisfied one with his action punches.Waiting for sequel....in 2023.
They presented Bangladesh as a very poor and country with no rules. Even though story of the movie is very cheap.

reviews.review_title: Great action movie.... But a weak plot weighs it down...
reviews.content:
Now already my expectations from this movie in terms of action was very high, and this movie hasn't disappointed me in that factor..
Firstly, let me tell you what I DID NOT like about this film
1. The Location...
The location of this movie is primarily based in Bangladesh, and because they wanted to portray the action sequences brutally, they went for a tightly spaced location which was quite rural and not actually like how Bangladesh looks like, and many Bangladeshis had an issue with this... Now they could have changed the plot in another manner to not let this happen, but it is something to be pointed out as a negative factor..
2. Lack of Character depth...
This movie primarily focuses on Tyler, the 14 year old Ovi and Saju of course, but there were so many more characters who could have got a better role, and they lacked character depth, even Chris Hemsworth's past wasn't that satisfactory... If the characters had bit more of a content, it would have helped the plot to be better as well...
Now what I LIKED about the film
1. The Hand to hand combat, chase sequences and Gunfights
I am not gonna type much about this cuz you got to watch the movie for that
2. The performances (The Cast)
Every character in this movie was excellent with great acting. Chris Hemsworth's character is well written and his emotional moments are also good... Randeep Hooda was awesome and finally got recognition for his talent through this film... all other characters were good too...
3. The emotional moments
This film is also gonna surprise you wth some emotional moments as well like between the child and Tyler, and even the emotional bonding between them...
It would be impactful for even those who do not like action films
As a whole I would just say that though the movie is not that good in terms of its storyline, it would not fail to impress in the action... Watch it if you r a die hard action film fan
Skip it if you r looking for an engaging plot with twists and turns and less violence

Couldn't find anything good but action. Moreover, a country was presented quite well, in a wrong way!!! It's not about the places actually. It's about the minimum authenticity of cultural elements that a film must follow. And who are ignoring this fact I believe they also praise movies where their countries are portrayed in a wrong way. Also, so many elements and details regarding Dhaka was this much incorrect that psychologically people who know Dhaka couldn't like it. But see the irony, whole the film was about a city in the background!!!! And that background is incorrect. So, if the target was just to promote good action and make profits then yah, you have done it. Otherwise as a movie, thumbs down! Anyway, if the shoot was taken place in Wakanda, still not worth of higher rates because the plot is about nothing. Just action.Vandalism!
Best best movie. i have seen all the series back from all the part its awesome. The acting od Chris and Randip was awesome

If you love Action Movies this is it. Amazing close quarter action. AMAZING Cinematography and Stunts. Still amazes how a Netflix movie could outdo a AAA Hollywood blockbuster. Deserves an 8.0 on IMDB, sadly losing grip because of some ignorant viewers. Please Ignore all Bangla haters.

reviews.review_title: Giving it a 10 to compensate for the 1 given by Bangladeshi's
reviews.content:
The movie is a fun watch! Great action! Lacks story! But not that bad! It's atleast a 7.5 movie. But bangladesh is giving it a 1? Wth? Indians should give it a 10 just for that(to help movie get its actual rating)
Overall much needed during quarantine. Take away from the movie was - RANDEEP HOODA!

reviews.review_title: Chris Hemsworth made the movie good
reviews.content: The only good actor and reason this movie is good is Chris Hemsworth. There was to much unrealistic action and over exaggerated acting (wonder where they got that from).

reviews.review_title: Chris Hemsworth made the movie good
reviews.content: The only good actor and reason this movie is good is Chris Hemsworth. A lot of unrealistic action and over exaggeration (wonder where they got that from).

Mixture of Emotions,actions,languages,actors from countries, not too much of drama an action suspenseful one ,Randeep was good with Chris .
Action scenes 10/10
Acting main leads 9/10
Dialogues/ screenplay 7/10
Direction 7/10
Realistic 7/10

reviews.review_title: Definately in the TOP 5 list of my action genre.
reviews.content:
I just cannot understand how the rating went down over 1 point in under 24 hours. Perhaps expectations superseded understanding of an excellent production. Especially when reviews are cloudy, wishy washy and just thrown out there for the sake of writing one.To be fair, the moment I saw the names Chis Hemsworth and Joe & Anthony Russo one could only imagine the child in me after watching Endgame.
I thought, even for a fiction flick of this nature, there was depth, intelligence and outstanding performances from Chris Hemsworth and Randeep Hooda. The action sequences were incredible, for lack of a better word and the story line is quite believable considering the real world.For me, watching a great movie means that I have to be drawn to it from beginning to end. I went into the film with a lot of expectation considering the likes of 13 Hours and Lone Survivor. Because of the outcome of it, the depth in the performances of Chris and Randeep, and the music score that adds to the intensity, I would watch it again. Not too soon, but I would. Netflix did it!

reviews.review_title: Best action movie till now on Netflix......
reviews.content: Underworld of weapons dealers and traffickers, a young boy becomes the pawn in a war between notorious drug lords. Trapped by kidnappers inside one of the world's most impenetrable cities, his rescue beckons the unparalleled skill of a mercenary named Tyler Rake. But Rake is a broken man with nothing to lose, harboring a death wish that makes an already deadly mission near impossible.

reviews.review_title: Only worth checking out for the action
reviews.content: The action in this movie is really well done and if that's all you care about you'll love this movie. Everything in between the action sequences was bland though. Very generic plot with poorly written dialogue. They didn't quite hit the emotional beats they were going for. Overall, it's a weak movie that's greatly elevated by the fantastic and creative action sequences.

My only question to the film makers is, 'What was the reason behind making this story based in Dhaka or even Bangladesh?' India could have just been fine. I would have given it 10/10. But as a Bangladeshi native, I cannot but express my dissatisfaction about the way film makers gave less attention to the use of Bengali language in the film. Even the setting which was supposed to be Dhaka was not at all in Dhaka. There is no forest around Buriganga river that runs through Dhaka. The mistake was sticking like a sore thumb. The women, the people, the sign boards, the accents of Bangla slang were all wrong. It could have been an excellent work if they could do it properly. They were using Calcutta tongue not Dhakaia language.This is was so disappointing.All the 7 star is for my favorite actor Chris Hemsworth. I could have been proud for this movie as it was staged in Bangladesh. Only if it were a reality - they could have done it Gazipur district with lots of forest to play firepower. Or in Khulna by Sundarbans.There is no way a car chase can be staged in Dhaka. LOL. There is no 'WAY' literally.

If you've seen the redemptive classic Man On Fire with Denzel Washington you don't really need to see this vacuous pale imitation. However, it is different, but only in the most miserable sense...Sure it's gun play is video game sharp (that's where my points for the film score), but it's soul is entirely borrowed, and never quite felt. So, hundreds of faceless, in this case Bangladeshi, people wiped out by a dubiously motivated white super soldier mercenary is always a horribly regrettable cliché of modern cinema. Bears absolutely no comparison to any historic reality. Unlike the gun violence in the USA, Bangladesh is simply not a gun toting country of child gangs and lawless gunplay. Famously, a warm and welcoming country, and rightly or wrongly, a pretty sedate, and ordered society. Not without it's problems, but nothing like this portrayal.So, regrettably, without local precedent, it becomes a relentless slog of just killing. Human destruction, nihilism of the worst kind. I actually hoped Hemsworth would stop early on, and the film would make more intelligent choices not his choice of course. He was funny in the Thors, but Brad Pitt he ain't.... Wink wink... Of course it didn't change, more faceless bodies piled up, urgh.Its essentially a complete video game fantasy for middle Americans, translated to film. Murdering the foreigners, just an impotent bedroom fantasy about death and murder, and not much else. Morbid fantasy for gamers, nothing for mankind. You know, set one in the USA for once, mow down the cops in scores, break some special forces necks. No? See you at the box office....
Director have no idea about Bangladesh. Director showed Bangladesh like any civil war country (Like Syria or Somalia). Very disgraceful.

Started slow and I was thinking low budget natural acting. Then the film started about 10 minutes in and did not disappoint. Car chase where you feel you're in the car, fight scenes where you feel amongst the bullets...brilliant!
Fast paced and good action other actor is given good on screen time like the lead actor

reviews.review_title: This movie was good. Story was good. I have no complaints
reviews.content:
This is a pure action movie that still managed to find time to explore:
Rakes tragic past that affects him
The kids disgust and sadness at being the son of a ruthless drug lord and being treated like a possession
Sajus love and fear for his family, particularly his son
Amirs mentor relationship with that phycho kid
(very briefly) you get to see a bit of rakes friendship with that other aussie guy before things go sour.
That for me is a lot for a movie like this, enough to feel something with each fight scene. Films like this benefit from simple stories so that it gets to focus more on the characters and action. Logan, The last of us, stories like those involving a badass taking care of someone who needs their help dont have convoluted storylines that would just ruin it. Just a simple end goal, and the journey to it and the emotions and rollercoasters that come along with it.

Which shows serious threats to a country it's people.
People generally assumes
Something bad watching content Against morality and cruelt. This movie portrays Bangladesh as a bad country and it's people as terrorists and goons.

reviews.review_title: Low budget average movie with below average performances
reviews.content:
Its a paatern now.
Netflix I think is producing low budget movies to create more and more of content without caring much about quality.
They are just spending their budget mainly on one superstar to market and give their content a push and all other aspects of film are sidelined.

reviews.review_title: Good action scenes, plot makes no sense...
reviews.content: Action scenes are very well done, reminds me of John Wick...perfect movie for friday evening, when you don't really want to think about anything.Because plot makes no much sense...to save son of a killer, I am willing to kill dozens and dozens of innocent men in the process...okay, maybe not all are innocent, but he is literally killing all those police officers who in the end are someones husbands, fathers, brothers, because of this kid who means nothing to you...yea, makes sense...you are totally a good guy making the right thing.
The camera work is exceptionally well. The action scenes are very well coordinated.

A good Saturday evening action movie.

But action scenes are very well done!

reviews.review_title: Creative freedom should not be synonymised with forgoing social responsibilities
reviews.content: I understand Extraction is a fiction and the genre is violent action with superhuman like protagonists. A handful lead actors can easily wreak havoc on an army trained professionals and literally send them to oblivion. But we are not talking about Avengers or Thor here.It becomes a problem when a production like this creates an allusion that the story setting and production design of the movie is 'the' true presentation of a real country, and it's capital, people and armed forces. Especially, if that country is the main setting of major Hollywood production for the first time ever.The production team might have taken some 'plateshots' of some filthy, dingy, overcrowded outskirts of the capital city of the story, which is fine, but that seemed to be the only thing to say about the city. The real nicer locations (not some artificial set) and millions of well educated middle class residents of the same city are totally missing. This is wrong, in my opinion.The law enforcement agencies as a whole have been portrayed as utterly corrupt and incompetent. Almost every single members of the force seemed to be chasing Chris Hemsworth and his band of hired guns like spellbound insects heading to light traps to meet their brutal ends. Explosions, gun fires, car crashes all happening nonstop in overcrowded and narrow suburban streets with complete disregard to many many innocent lives to save only the life of a kidnapped son of a drug lord. And this is somehow a redemption for the protagonist that audience should empathise with or even deem heroic!It is very unfortunate to see how a respectable movie personality like Chris Hemsworth may have tarnished the image of a country (he most likely has never visited) and its people in the name of fiction and entertainment.
Srsly most boring movie ever except for chris hem's fighting scenes which are cool and he is super hot that's why i gave a generous 4 stars. It deserves a 1 but he is rly that hot.

The director must have had a really hard job for this one.There isn't much of a storyline really.The bad man in prison has a son on the outside.Another bad man kidnaps the first bad man's son for some unknown reason.The father orders his sons bodyguard to do whatever it takes to get his son back or he will lose his own son.The bodyguard tells his wife that he knows of someone who can get the child back, but they won't be able to afford him.Then all of a sudden Mr Hemsworth and his group are brought onto the scene.The rest of the movie is one gunfight after another.In the end we never find out why the father was in jail, who the bad guy was and why he wanted his son. We never even find out if the dad is still in jail or what?This was like a upmarket Jason Statham film, all action and no real story.

reviews.review_title: Dissapointed in the story, cast and setting...
reviews.content: There was (almost) no story! An action movie with Chris Hemsworth's starring stature could have been based on a far more formidable storyline. This should have been filmed in India totally. The weird Bangla accent is anything but Bangladeshi or 'Dhakaiya' Bangla. An ensemble of strange looking cast, who neither look like or talk like people of Dhaka, is another weak work.Writers/producers of this movie should acclimatize themselves with the location where their movies are based. Come and stay physically or get on to the Internet to find movies/dramas of the original location. And by the way, Dhaka has never seen anything even remotely close to the magnitude of violence that has been depicted. And a gangster criminal with his own force in uniform and AK-47 and host of weapons - that's utterly ridiculous to the context of Dhaka. Poor work! Giving it 4-star only for Chris and his actions.
Russell Crow's son Chris doesn't know how to act. So sad. :(

The whole movie, rather I'll say a series or accumulation of a couple of action sequences is a big failure. It does not pass as a good story teller at all. The whole movie has barely any story. The screenplay is not written properly, nor it's execution is good or well done. Direction in respect to story telling is not up to the mark as it lacks the layers of a cinema that would unfold as it progresses.Coming to the point of characters, casting is very good, Indian actors like Randeep Hooda, Manoj Bajpai are really good actors, but they are being completely wasted as there's no space of character development or character progression. The whole film surrounds around Hemsworth, and I'll not say his performance is bad, but also not great.Action films of 90s have a similar pace and style.The only thing good about this movie is its execution of action sequences and its cinematography. The scenes are shot from great angle, and it's no surprise as the Ruso brothers are very fond of them. The movie has used a rusty color grading to portray Dhaka similiar to that used in breaking bad to portray Mexico.
For a industry like Hollywood it's very easy to decorate a movie with all this ornaments to make it look professional and eye catching, but at the end of the day it doesn't increases it's cinematic values.In summarisation I'll say this is not a good movie, the outcome of it is disappointing im respect for expectations. But one can watch it for entertainment or momentary thrill.

reviews.review_title: If Dan Brown and the producers of Homeland worked on a film set in Bangladesh
reviews.content: Bangladesh has been one of the most obscure countries in the world. Other than it's obvious poverty, not much is known about this country. Extraction has been one of the first appearances of Bangladesh in Hollywood. And it is a complete insult to Bangladeshi people. Bangladesh is not a great country. There is rampant poverty, large economic disparity, the issue of terrorism, and rise in illegal drugs and gambling. But in this movie, Bangladesh is portrayed as if it is Yemen or a generic African country. Dhaka city is shown as yellow, as if it has jaundice. Also the city is shown to be near a jungle. There are no jungles in near Dhaka or in the Dhaka district.The nearest jungles would be around Sylhet or Khulna. Land around Dhaka is mostly farmland. Also Dhaka is portrayed as lawless with the police and "Elite"units under one drug lord. There is no such unit called an "Elite". The closest would be the Rapid Action Battalion (RAB). Portraying them as under the payroll of drug lords is insulting as they were the ones who have been carrying out a controversial crackdown against them and illegal gamblers recently. The movie also features children walking around with AK-47 SMGs in public, like as if Bangladesh is a war-torn African country. Bangladesh is one of those emerging economies, on par with Vietnam. Dhaka city may contain slums, but they do not make up the entire city. The movie also shows Hindi songs playing in every house. Bangladesh also has a music industry. Also, the local Bangla spoken is nothing like the one spoken in Bangladesh. It sounds more like a West Bengali accent like those spoken in Kolkata. They not only did not shoot the movie in Bangladesh, filming mostly in Ahmedabad in India with some scenes filmed in Thailand. There were also no Bangladeshi actors used with most of the locals being played by Indians such as Rudraksh Jaiswal. Also one the cast members is an Iranian named Golshifteh Farahani. Iranians are not the same as Bangladeshis. Also Iranians should stop playing Indians, Bangladeshis, and Arabs as a lot of them are willing to play negative stereotypes of Muslims and Arabs. Navid Negahan being one. The inaccuracies are as bad as those of Dan Brown novels such as Digital Fortress, which got Seville wrong, and Homeland, which gets things wrong about Beirut, Islamabad, and Islam. People try to justify these by using the "it's fiction"excuse. Other than those inaccuracies, the movie also follows a white savior narrative. Our hero Tyler Rake is a typical white action hero. Although not an American, as Rake is made Australian to match his actor Chris Hemsworth, he has traits of a typical white American action hero. Just to save one child, he massacres many Bangladeshis. The movies plot is partly borrowed from the far superior Man on Fire, starring the Denzel Washington. The former atleast wasn't a modern "Might Whitey" story and had actual Mexican actors for a movie set in Mexico. People seem to really think this is best movie since John Wick. This movie has nothing in common with John Wick other than the brilliant fight scenes. It is more of a spiritual successor to Beirut (2018), due to its white savior narrative and inaccurate portrayal of a certain city in a developing country.
I really enjoyed this well acted action movie. Well directed and written. Hemsworth does a great job. The chase scene where there is no cut, its continuous, is worth the watch alone.
Bangladesh not like that. It's time to rise up Bangladeshi. Is india our friend? No, our Main enemy. It is high time to ban every things india also its time to ban Netflix.
